text: Brahim Boutaleb (; 31 December 1937 â€“ 1 March 2022) was a Moroccan historian, academic, and politician. He was born in Fez, French Protectorate in Morocco, France. He was a professor at Mohammed V University. From 1977 until 1983, Boutaleb was a member of the House of Representatives. Boutaleb died on 1 March 2022 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Moroccan politicians Category:Moroccan academics Category:Moroccan historians
title: Brahim Boutaleb
